title: Choosing the Right Red Hat AI Solution: RHEL AI vs. OpenShift AI
author: Oyedele Tioluwani
description: Compare Red Hat Enterprise Linux AI’s simplicity with OpenShift AI’s scalability to make an informed decision about Red Hat's AI solutions.
cntitle: 选择合适的红帽人工智能解决方案：RHEL AI vs. OpenShift AI
cndescription: 比较红帽企业 Linux AI 的简易性与 OpenShift AI 的可扩展性，以便就红帽的 AI 解决方案做出明智的决定。
